alert.note: Alert for Baker County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 5:17PM PST until January 09 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM MONDAY TO 10 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches except 8 to 12 inches in mountains above 5500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph on Tuesday afternoon. * WHERE...Baker County zone. * WHEN...From 10 PM Monday to 10 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulating snowfall with very cold temperatures will likely continue through the weekend with a very active pattern anticipated through Saturday. High winds will impact travel especially on Tuesday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
